normalized: for the moment that the point of the majuu's horn would pierce her.
the horn very nearly came into contact with her suit, but asagi dodged it with such speed that she left an afterimage behind.
leaving it to centrifugal force, she turned her body all the way around――
and swung her sword horizontally, aiming for the majuu's horn, which was passing by at high speed.
asagi's sword cut off the majuu's horn.
the majuu lost balance and crashed to the floor of the rooftop, sliding along it in accordance with its momentum.
and then, it howled as if enraged, and writhed on the floor, swinging its front and rear legs at random.
not failing to see this opportunity, asagi instantly focused her spiritual enegry in order to finish off the majuu.
however, even if she slashed at it directly, she would be repelled by the majuu's body, which was armoured by its tough fur.
